dialog.text: Bottom 3/5ths is stone. Right on top of the stone is a small sea layer that starts at left and goes to middle of screen.
Above the sea there is mountains. Think of the Himalayas. Snowy mountains and sea in the middle, and stone in the foreground. Sky is mostly cloudy and blue in the middle 1/6th
which angle are we looking at the mountain? at a sea level?
Yeah, sea level. The mountains are in a parabola shape. across the drawing. There is also stone on the right side of the mountain, 3 peaks of snow.
what is the color tone of the image? is the sky mainly blue?
The Sky is mainly blue. Image should be bright and snowy.
is there anything else in the image?
No, I don't have any more peeks, so I think I will end it now.
